page.title: 20Debbies day in Cottesmore
page.content: Mrs Taylor is called Debbie, she is thirty one years old.She likes keep fit and amateur dramatics in her spare time time. Amateur dramatics is held at the Swing-Wing Club, it is a place where you act plays.when I stopped at her house, she got up at half past 6.She has 2 children, 1 boy and 1 girl, the youngest is a girl.She does not cut her own hair, she went to the hair dressers. Debbie travels around alot.The boys name is Nikki and the girls name is Alex.Nikki and Alex want a dog but they have not got any pets.Debbie likes writing poetry.She likes writing about horses,ponies,dogs and cats.She lives across the main road at Burley Circle.She likes fish and chips a lot.Friday evenings from 6 o/clock till 7:30 she does a drama club, I go to that.
